name: BlockSafe Banking
desc: A blockchain-based banking security system to counter transaction intrusion, Man-in-the-Middle attacks, and money laundering. Implemented a three-step verification protocol, secure UPI ID validation with OTP confirmation, and real-time transaction updates, enhancing security and efficiency in financial transactions.
